question:
You live in a room which you share with another student. You have some problems with your roommate. Write a letter to the accomodation officer of the college to change your room. In your letter:
*mention the problems you are facing
*say how these problems are affecting you
*request for a new room
text: I, a student of M.Com final year, living in the hostel in room no. 23 with another student. I am writing to you in connection with changing of room.

I am sharing this place with a girl who irritates me a lot. She invites her old friends who are living in  different rooms and do parties with them. She is not a tidy person and kept the leftover items in the room which produced a foul smell. Apart from this, she plays loud music.
I am concentrating on my studies and working on a presentation for the upcoming exam. However, due to the above-mentioned circumstances, I am unable to focus on my goals and it distracts me too much.

I also talked to her and explain my problem yet she pays no attention to it. Thus, It would be really appreciable if you could please shift me to another room so that I can attain good grades in examinations.
I am hoping that you will take a speedy action on it.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article, a, may be redundant when used with the uncountable noun action in your sentence. Consider removing it.
